title: Accidentally Purchased Fiora with RP Instead of IP..
body: So, I usually don't add RP, and I've been playing with barely any RP for the last year or so. That means I just click on whatever button is available when buying champions usually. Well, today, I was buying a champion with IP (Fiora) and accidentally clicked on RP. I was saving for sales, but guess not. I already submitted a ticket. Is there even the slightest chance I can get the RP back? I used my refunds years ago....

replies.body: If you have any refund tokens left, you can use one to perform a refund per our [refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If you're out of tokens, it's unlikely that we can assist with this.  We can certainly try and see what we can do, so submitting a ticket was a solid idea.  Hang tight until then!
